headline: Green Action League: Arsenal, Los Angeles Rams, Denver Nuggets, and Colorado Avalanche launch international sustainability competition
summary: Today four of the biggest teams in global sports – Arsenal, Los Angeles Rams, Denver Nuggets, and Colorado Avalanche – join forces to launch the "Green Action League," the largest fan-driven campaign on sustainability ever seen in sports. This collaborative tournament invites European football, American football, basketball, and ice hockey supporters to compete against one another to help their team secure the title of the 'greenest fans'.
